body.draft-comment: This topic will describe how Webhelp templates works.

draft-comment.author: webapp
draft-comment.b: Create a special/separate index.html page for responsive webhelp

body.p: A Webhelp template consist of a set of HTML template pages. Each HTML template file can contains one or more predefined components.
All the Webhelp templates are stored in the templates folder located in the root folder of the webhelp plugin. The structure of an Webhelp template is the following:...
The next sections describes the HTML template pages.

section.title: The template for the Webhelp main page
section.p: This template is used to generate the main page (index.html) of the Webhelp output.
Basically, this template is used to generate links to the main topics of the publication.
